title: Lease Purchase Program: Join Transco Lines Today
text: Lease Purchase Program Details Transco Lines is looking for Over the Road lease purchase Teams and Solo Drivers. We are hiring Hazmat and Non-Hazmat drivers and have many dedicated opportunities available. Drive with TLI Steady Miles, Steady Pay, and More! Corporate: Hiring: GREAT BENEFITS - Paid on Loaded and Empty Miles - Great equipment options - No Trailers Fees - Safety Inspection Bonuses - Referral Bonuses - Rider Policy - Pet Policy - Weekly Pay - 98% Drop & Hook For Team Drivers, 50% For Solo Drivers - Solo Drivers Average 2,500 Miles Per Week - Team Drivers Average Between 5,500 And 6,200 Miles Per Week Testimonials I’ve been driving truck for 18 years, and one of the reasons I came to TLI was because I wanted to be home more with my family. Also the freedom without anyone looking over your shoulder all the time, along with good money, good benefits, and home time Mark C. - Solo Driver As being a driver over 20 years, it’s in my blood and I’m a third generation truck driver. It’s like a home when they treat you right and they treat you good. It’s like a family to me and in two years I’ve moved up from the bottom to the top. Ryan D. - Solo Driver We do Team trucking for TLI and one of the things that really exceeded our expectations was the family atmosphere and how readily help is available to you when you need it out on the road. We feel like we’ve been really blessed. Jamen and Bari L. - Team Drivers They treat their employees like they are family and do not micro-manage, but you can pick up the phone and get a hold of someone right away. We’ve drove for a lot of different companies and TLI is a really great company. Chris and Sarah M. - Team Drivers They don’t rush and micromanage you, you can run as hard as you want to and get loads and go. Everybody is really friendly and answers the phone and communicates.
